00017 int main()

00019     const unsigned runs_count = 3;
00020     const unsigned layers_count = 10;
00021     const unsigned threads_count = 8;
00022 
00023     TrainPattern tp(1, 1);
00024     tp.input[0] = -100;
00025 
00026     {
00027         vector<unsigned> layers;
00028         layers.push_back(1);
00029         for(unsigned i = 0; i < layers_count; ++i)
00030             layers.push_back(30);
00031         layers.push_back(1);
00032 
00033         Net* net = NetworkModel::MultilayerPerceptron(layers, ActivationFunction::TanH::Instance());
00034         net->setThreadCount(threads_count);
00035 
00036         cout<<"MLP ready\n";
00037 
00038         //Test run()
00039         {
00040             progress_timer t;
00041             for(unsigned i = 0; i < runs_count; i++)
00042             {
00043                 cout<<i+1<<"-th run: "; 
00044                 cout.flush();
00045                 {
00046                     progress_timer t;
00047                     net->setInput(tp.input);
00048                     net->run(FeedforwardPropagationRunner::Instance());
00049                 }
00050             }
00051             cout<<"Total: ";
00052         }
00053         //Output
00054         valarray<Float> output;
00055         net->getOutput(output);
00056         cout<<"Test output: "<<setprecision(5)<<fixed<<output[0]<<endl;
00057         
00058         //Debug
00059         {
00060         ostringstream ost;
00061         //net->printDebugInfo(ost);
00062         cout<<ost.str();
00063         }
00064     
00065         //Serialization test
00066         Storage::save(*net, "test_net.txt");
00067 
00068         //Memory consumption test
00069         cout<<"It's time to do memory test\n";
00070 //        sleep(5);
00071     }
00072 
00073     Net net2;
00074     cout<<"New net...OK\n";
00075     Storage::load(net2, "test_net.txt");
00076 
00077     //Debug
00078     {
00079     ostringstream ost;
00080     //net2.printDebugInfo(ost);
00081     cout<<ost.str();
00082     }
00083     
00084     //Test run()
00085     {

00087         net2.setInput(tp.input);
00088         net2.run(FeedforwardPropagationRunner::Instance());
